price: Kemudian dikatakan kepada orang-orang yang zalim (musyrik) itu, "Rasakanlah olehmu siksaan yang kekal; kamu tidak diberi balasan, melainkan dengan apa yang telah kamu kerjakan".
arabic: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ هَلۡ تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma qīla lilladhīna ẓalamū dhūqū ʿadhāba al-khul'di hal tuj'zawna illā bimā kuntum taksibūna
